channel.title: Posts on LE BLOG DE QUELEANALYTICS
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on LE BLOG DE QUELEANALYTICS

item.title: Predict Wine quality with data analytics (Part 3)
item.description: Third part of Predict Wine quality with data analytics. Objective I finished 2019 with a nice project for a client in the wine industry. I wanted materials linked to wine to popularize how Data and Analytics could help business gain more value. In the perspective of how we could use analytics for his business, I point up a case widely known in the data science community using analytics to predict wine quality.

item.title: Predict Wine quality with data analytics (Part 2)
item.description: Part II of Predict Wine quality with data analytics . Objective I finished 2019 with a nice project for a client in the wine industry. I wanted materials linked to wine to popularize how Data and Analytics could help business gain more value. In the perspective of how we could use analytics for his business, I point up a case widely known in the data science community using analytics to predict wine quality.

item.description: Objective I finished 2019 with a nice project for a client in the wine industry. I wanted materials linked to wine to popularize how Data and Analytics could help business gain more value. In the perspective of how we could use analytics for his business, I point up a case widely known in the data science community using analytics to predict wine quality.

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Nous mettrons ici des sujets, divers et variés, autant en français qu’en anglais que nous traiterons. Data Analytics, QueleAnalytics↩
